pullRequest.body:
add two lemmas of the form `Pi.mulSingle_pow`

---

if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

nodes.body:
### PR summary [26604ca4cc](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/16774/commits/26604ca4cc74b10a0c77d44f39cee952a4a773c3)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

`+ Pi.mulSingle_pow`
`+ Pi.mulSingle_zpow`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

Thanks!

bors r+

On Fri, 13 Sept 2024, 20:47 Antoine Chambert-Loir, ***@***.***>
wrote:

> ***@***.**** commented on this pull request.
> ------------------------------
>
> In Mathlib/Algebra/Group/Pi/Lemmas.lean
> <https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/16774#discussion_r1759322404>
> :
>
> > @@ -248,6 +248,15 @@ theorem Pi.mulSingle_div [∀ i, Group <| f i] (i : I) (x y : f i) :
>      mulSingle i (x / y) = mulSingle i x / mulSingle i y :=
>    (MonoidHom.mulSingle f i).map_div x y
>
> ***@***.***_additive]
> +theorem Pi.mulSingle_pow [∀ i, Monoid (f i)] (i : I) (x : f i) (n : ℕ) :
> +    mulSingle i (x ^ n) = (mulSingle i x) ^ n :=
> +  (MonoidHom.mulSingle f i).map_pow x n
> +
> ***@***.***_additive]
> +theorem Pi.mulSingle_zpow [∀ i, Group (f i)] (i : I) (x : f i) (n : ℤ) :
> +    Pi.mulSingle i (x ^ n) = (Pi.mulSingle i x) ^ n :=
> +  (MonoidHom.mulSingle f i).map_zpow x not
>
> yes, last minute typo…
>
> —
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/16774#discussion_r1759322404>,
> or unsubscribe
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AHESIOXA2UUSC7AKCJNWR7DZWMXLLAVCNFSM6AAAAABOF4J6H6VHI2DSMVQWIX3LMV43YUDVNRWFEZLROVSXG5CSMV3GSZLXHMZDGMBTHAZTGOBSG4>
> .
> You are receiving this because you commented.Message ID:
> ***@***.***>
>

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10854526262/job/30125143095)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10854526262/job/30125143391)

```suggestion
    mulSingle i (x ^ n) = mulSingle i x ^ n :=
```

```suggestion
    mulSingle i (x ^ n) = mulSingle i x ^ n :=
```

```suggestion
  (MonoidHom.mulSingle f i).map_zpow x n
```
I guess this is what you intended to say?

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Algebra/Group/Pi/Lemmas): add Pi.mulSingle_pow
